title: Flooring Installation
description: Duncan MC Construction has the expertise to install all types of flooring. From hardwood, laminate, tile, carpet tiles, engineered wood, and vinyl plank we can help you with your flooring needs.

title: Residential Remodels
description: Looking to remodel that kitchen or bathroom? Duncan MC Construction can help. Call and tell us about it. We love to make places better.
alt: Duncan MC Construction LLC, Small Remodels

title: Residential Home Repair
description: We provide a wide range of home repair services. From building a new deck, new siding, or flooring. We are just a phone call away to help you with your current or future projects.
alt: Duncan MC Construction LLC, Home Repairs
